solution_line_template: In mid-June, the river is {mid_july_depth}/{times_deeper_than_mid_june}=<<{mid_july_depth}/{times_deeper_than_mid_june}={mid_june_depth}>>{mid_june_depth} feet deep.
In mid-May, the river was {mid_june_depth}-{deeper_than_mid_may}=<<{mid_june_depth}-{deeper_than_mid_may}={mid_may_depth}>>{mid_may_depth} feet deep.
